name: Default››export
description:
A simple and interfaceless way to set the common export settings most of us use for sharing visuals.


Run this plugin to set all Frames to 1x PNG, 2x PNG, 3x PNG and SVG. Perfect for setting files up for Developer handover.


These plugins are free to us, but if you fancy buying me a coffee because it's been useful to you, I'd be grateful: https://ko-fi.com/kemiljk
